com.wm.pkg.sap.idoc
Class IDOCSegment

java.lang.Object
  com.wm.pkg.sap.idoc.IDOCSegment
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API. 

public class IDOCSegment
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an IDoc data segment. It allows to create new segments, put a value to a certain field or to retrieve a value from a segment.

See Also:
IDOC

Constructor Detail

IDOCSegment

public IDOCSegment(com.wm.util.Values segment)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Constructs an IDOCSegment object from an existing Values object representing the segment. It wraps the Values object and does not create copies of it.

Parameters:
segment - The segment as a Values object

IDOCSegment

public IDOCSegment(java.lang.String segmentName)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Constructs a new IDOCSegment object, that represents a segment of type segmentName.

Parameters:
segmentName - The name of the segment that is constructed.

getHeader

public java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String fieldName)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Returns the Value of the requested segment header field. Possible values are: TABNAN, MANDT, DOCNUM, SEGNUM, SEGNAM, HLEVEL, and PSGNUM.

Parameters:
fieldName - Name of the field in the segment header to retrieve.

setHeader

public void setHeader(java.lang.String fieldName,
                      java.lang.String value)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Sets the Value of the specified segment header field. Possible values for the field names are: TABNAN, MANDT, DOCNUM, SEGNUM, SEGNAM, HLEVEL, and PSGNUM.

Parameters:
fieldName - Name of the field in the segment header to retrieve
value - Value to set the fieldname to.

Parameters:
fieldName - Name of the SDATA field to retrieve the value from

getInternalName

public static java.lang.String getInternalName(java.lang.String externalName)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Handle 4.6x IDOC SEGNAMs, which may contain sequence numbers appended to the SEGNAM. This conversion logic was taken from non-rfc functions in SAP ECC: In 4.0 only, the function is called segment_internal_name_get. In 3.x, the function is called edi_segnam_get. We duplicate the logic here in order to be release-independent.

Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.
